page.title: 11Life Styles
page.content: Most children come to school by{car although some juniors{walk or cycle. About one third of the children will be going{abroad for holidays.}Number work was favourite in the infants, {painting and drawing}with the lower juniors.{Sports}was the favourite subject in the top juniors. The {average family was four people,}who lived in houses in Sandhurst. The {pocket money at 5 yrs was 10p-25p and {55p-Â£1.00 at 11yrs. The favourite pet in classes 1 & 2 was the{fish}but overall the favourite was the{cat. In a class of 33 children the favourite food was{traditional English {roast dinner, 16 like Indian curry, 14 {liked Chinese food.}The favourite foods wer icecream, chips, salad, cheese, sausages, chicken, hamburgers, fruit and sweets.
